      <text:text xmlns:text="http://jazz.net/xmlns/alm/rm/text/v0.1" artifactRole="" type="Supporting Material">
        <text:richTextBody>
          <div>
            <h:div xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
              <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1393" dir="ltr"> </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1394" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:11pt">Product Parameter User Guide</h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:div dir="ltr">
                <h:table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1395">
                  <h:tbody>
                    <h:tr>

                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>

                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1401" dir="ltr">

                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 246px; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(194, 214, 155);" id="_1402">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1403" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Significance</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 70px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1490724278524">1</h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 182px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1490724278525">Renewal Notice Exemption Term</h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1490724278526">
                        <h:span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Open text (Numeric)</h:span>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 246px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1490724278527">
                        <h:span style="font-size:9pt">Flag to identify if the Renewal Notice to be issued for accounts in this product if the term is equal to or less than this number.                   Mandatory                </h:span>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 70px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1412">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1413" dir="ltr">2</h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 182px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1414">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1415" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Pre-Renewal Notice Flag</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1416">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1417" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Dropdown</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 246px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1418">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1419" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Flag to identify if the Pre-Renewal Notice to be issued for these accounts. </h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 70px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1420">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1421" dir="ltr">

                        </h:p>

                        </h:p>

                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1427" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Enter the no of days, the notice to be generated before CD maturity</h:span>

                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1432">

                        </h:p>

                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">5</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 182px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1438">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1439" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Post-Renewal Notice Days</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1440">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1441" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Open text (Numeric)</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 246px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1442">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1443" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Enter the no of days, the notice to be generated after CD maturity</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 70px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1444">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1445" dir="ltr">

                      </h:td>

                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1448">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1449" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Dropdown</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 246px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1450">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1451" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Flag to identify if the Maturity Notice to be issued for these accounts. </h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 70px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1452">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1453" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">7</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 182px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1454">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1455" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Maturity Notice Days</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 119px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1456">
                        <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1457" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Open text (Numeric)</h:span>

              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1469" dir="ltr"> </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1520" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:11pt">Account Amendment – User Guide</h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:div dir="ltr">
                <h:table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_1521">
                  <h:tbody>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 53px; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(194, 214, 155);" id="_1522">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1523" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Sl.No</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 197px; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(194, 214, 155);" id="_1524">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1525" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Field Name</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 129px; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(194, 214, 155);" id="_1526">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1527" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Field Types</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 237px; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(194, 214, 155);" id="_1528">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1529" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Significance</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 53px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1442001027074">1</h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 197px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1442001027075">LYTD Interest Field</h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 129px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1442001027076">Display</h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 237px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1442001027077">Display Last Year to Date Interest amount in this field.</h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 53px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1530">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1531" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">2</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 197px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1532">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1533" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">RP Flag</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 129px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1534">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1535" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Display</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 237px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1536">Display to indicate if the account is enrolled in the RP program.</h:td>
                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 53px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1538">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1539" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">3</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 197px; vertical-align: top;" id="_1540">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_1541" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:10pt">Pre-Renewal Notice Flag</h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
